import React from "react" import "./music.css" import Slider from "react-slick" import Heading from "../../../common/heading/Heading" import { music } from "../../../../dummyData" const Music = () => { const settings = { dots: false, infinite: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 2, slidesToScroll: 1, } return ( <>
{music.map((val) => { return (
{val.catgeory}

{val.title.slice(0, 50)}...

Onde assistir
) })}
) } export default Music
